name: Epic Arena
description: Epic Arena is a free-to-play turn-based strategy game. Pick one of three completely different teams and outwit your opponent in epic back-and-forth matches. Flex your tactical muscles in time-limited Blitz mode matches or take your time in turn-by-turn duels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Never have I ever had more fun with a strategy game. The scenario-esk missions are challenging but quick to speed through, and the strategy necessary to dominate multiplayer games is great.   Problems The players themselves are the problem, leaving when they're going to lose.  It's impossible to acquire more than one deck without paying real money  The game itself is 10/10
Its like a Hex Hero Academy

As a fan of turn-based/board games, I can say that this game provides great variety of unique moves and strategies (fast push, single core team, etc.), power cards give you even more flexibility to destroy your  enemy's base. If you like to win games using your strategic skills - definitely recommend!
Great game with good graphics and balance. I give it a 8/10 for its gameplay and power cards.
